name: Explore Pixeland
description:
What's this?

We're building a space for indie developers to meet, learn and work on their projects - Pixeland! In this game you'll be able to roam around a scale model, see the plans and collect hats, cards, blueprints + more! The game will be updated regularly with new sections and up-to-date progress.

$35 (Donations/USD • updated weekly • 10% goes to Itch.io) All revenue of this game goes towards the construction of the space, consider a small donation when downloading! Gameplay Collect meaningless cards that display interesting trivia about Pixeland, the history and games made by the community! Take a toy blaster (yes, that one - we can't say the brand) and shoot hidden bottles or anything else you wish to shoot, foam darts are harmless...or are they? Act out your wildest dreams of... construction planning. Find valuable blueprints and see the future of Pixeland! Requirements

The game can be played only using a mouse (or trackpad) and keyboard. Windows compatible, not compatible with other operating systems.
